title: Death Defying Acts
description: Max and Ethan are back, facing difficult clients, an angry stalker, and their own powerful desires for each other.  Business responsibilities and the Poole family legacy are distractions while Max and Ethan, bodyguards for the rich and spoiled of Las Vegas, take on an assignment protecting an aerial acrobatics duo who is being harassed by what seems to be a homophobic stalker. Max knows how important professionalism is. He owns the business. But the stress of protecting the antagonistic acrobats and his own inability to resist the submissive siren call that is Ethan causes him to lose control. With a potentially dangerous, hateful stalker on the loose, can he afford to let down his guard and allow Ethan to get too close? Numerous graphic sexual situations. BDSM.  Don't miss any of the Sin City series books: 1: Dom of Las Vegas (FREE!) 2: Limited Liability 3: Acceptable Sacrifices 4: High Roller 5: Most Wanted 6: Lessons in Obedience 7: Death Defying Acts 8: The Dom's Club  Join the mailing list for the latest m/m romances and promotions! http://www.triciaowensbooks.com/list
author: Tricia Owens
